classic.name: Bassins des Lumières
classic.address: Imp. Brown de Colstoun, 33300 Bordeaux, France

classic.name: Cathédrale Saint-André de Bordeaux
classic.description: Towering Romanesque cathedral dating to the 11th century, hosting regular services & organ recitals.

classic.name: Place de la Bourse
classic.description: Iconic city square with 18th-century architecture, a fountain & a vast reflecting pool.
classic.address: Pl. de la Bourse, 33000 Bordeaux, France

classic.name: Opéra National de Bordeaux - Grand-Théâtre
classic.description: This grand theatre with a façade dating from 1780 hosts operas, dance & music performances.
classic.address: Pl. de la Comédie, 33000 Bordeaux, France

classic.name: Grosse Cloche
classic.description: 7.75-ton 18th-century bell above a former dungeon for juveniles, rung on special occasions.

classic.name: Base sous-marine
classic.description: Venerable World War II submarine base now used as an arts museum & exhibit gallery.

classic.name: Muséum de Bordeaux
classic.description: Natural history museum, established soon after the French revolution, in a grand building.

classic.name: Place des Quinconces
classic.description: Landmark piazza laid out in 1820, with memorials & ornate fountains, now hosting funfairs & markets.

classic.name: Miroir d'eau
classic.description: Built in 2006 by the Place de la Bourse, this reflecting pool is one of the world's largest.
classic.address: Pl. de la Bourse, 33000 Bordeaux, France

classic.name: Porte Cailhau
classic.description: Built in 1495, this monument with a castle-like exterior was once the main gate to the city.

foodie.name: Palatino
foodie.description: Laid-back Italian restaurant with charming, playful decor offering pasta, pizzas, grills & desserts.
foodie.address: 8 Rue de la Merci, 33000 Bordeaux, France

foodie.name: suzzi
foodie.description: Cozy venue serving Swedish brunch staples including waffles, open-faced sandwiches & cinnamon rolls.

foodie.name: Arkose Bordeaux
foodie.address: 170 Cr du Médoc Galerie Tatry, 33300 Bordeaux, France

foodie.name: Les Halles Bacalan
foodie.description: This food market features a collection of specialist providers of gourmet foods & drinks.

foodie.name: Books & Coffee
foodie.description: Sandwiches & salads, plus evening wine & tapas, at sidewalk tables with views of the Grosse Cloche.

adventure.address: Av. du Général de Gaulle, 33290 Blanquefort, France

adventure.name: Forêt du Bourgailh
adventure.description: Sustainable park built on landfill, with woodland hikes, bike parks & exotic plants in greenhouses.

adventure.name: Jardin public
adventure.description: Public green space with an arboretum & large lake, plus a natural history museum & a puppet theater.
adventure.address: Rue du Jardin public, 33000 Bordeaux, France

adventure.name: Parc Bordelais
adventure.description: 19th-century, 69-acre park with mature trees, a large lake, local-breed farm animals & play areas.

adventure.name: Monument aux Girondins
adventure.description: Monument with a fountain & towering column erected to honor Girondin revolutionaries.

adventure.name: Parc de Bourran
adventure.description: 18-hectare landscaped park with a vast lake, rare trees from America & Asia, plus exotic animals.

adventure.name: Parc Peixotto
adventure.address: Cr de la Libération, 33400 Talence, France

adventure.name: Circuit de randonnée Delta Vert
adventure.address: Av. Pierre Mendès France, 33130 Bègles, France

adventure.name: Zoo de Bordeaux-Pessac
adventure.description: Large zoo with many species of animals in natural habitats, plus feeding sessions & shows.
